channel.title: Pages on Sonia Mitchell
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Sonia Mitchell

item.title: About me
item.description: Education PhD Environmental and Evolutionary Biology, University of Glasgow (2018) MSc Bioengineering, with distinction, Strathclyde University (2012) Accredited by the Institute of Physics and Engineering in Medicine (IPEM) BSc Physics and Applied Physics, Strathclyde University (2001) Employment Lead Research Software Engineer, Scottish COVID-19 Response Consortium [SCRC] (May 2020 to date) Postdoctoral Research Assistant, BAHCM, University of Glasgow (2018 to date) Teaching Assistant for Biodiversity and Advanced Programming in R MSc courses, University of Glasgow (2017 to date) English Instructor, Chonnam National University, South Korea (2008-2011) Middle School English Teacher, Okgwa Middle School, South Korea (2007-2008) Publications and Related Software Schneider, K.

item.title: Cool things
item.description: Data science data-to-viz - a gallery of graphs and visualisations The R Graph Gallery - an R based visualisation gallery Shiny Skins - different layout options for Shiny Teaching learn git branching - an interactive Git tutorial terminus - an interactive command line tutorial (text adventure) gams in r course - an interactive GAMs course Misc play zork in R - run Frotz in R (text adventure)
